## Introduction

The world of AI has been dominated by massive, billion-parameter Large Language Models (LLMs). However, a new trend is emerging: the rise of Small Language Models (SLMs). These smaller, more efficient models are proving to be powerful alternatives for a wide range of applications.

This post explores the growing importance of SLMs, their advantages over their larger counterparts, and how they are democratizing access to cutting-edge AI technology.
